<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/roomquotasettings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves the room quota settings specified in the request to the current portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["defaultQuota"],"type":"object","properties":{"enableQuota":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the storage quota restrictions are enabled.","example":true},"defaultQuota":{"oneOf":[{"type":"integer","example":1234},{"type":"string","example":"some text"}],"description":"The default storage quota value applied to new users."}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for managing the user storage quota configurations.","title":"QuotaSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Tenant room quota settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"enableQuota":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if the quota is enabled for the tenant entity or not.","example":true},"defaultQuota":{"type":"integer","description":"The default quota of the tenant entity.","format":"int64","example":1234},"lastRecalculateDate":{"type":"string","description":"The date of the last quota recalculation.","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"},"lastModified":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The room quota settings.","title":"TenantRoomQuotaSettings"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"TenantRoomQuotaSettingsWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"402":{"description":"Your pricing plan does not support this option"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
